ygData.subject: RE: Jewelery primer
ygData.msgSnippet: just an FYI, black pearls are DEX/AGI, fire emeralds are STR/DEX.  and the 4 things diamonds add to are your resistances.  good thing is that fire emeralds,
ygData.messageBody:
just an FYI, black pearls are DEX/AGI, fire emeralds are STR/DEX. and the 4
things diamonds add to are your resistances. good thing is that fire
emeralds, unlike black pearls, can be bought.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, Level 20 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


>
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
If you ever get a black pearl or a diamond as loot DON'T
> sell them!
>
> Save them till you find a good jeweler and commission
> him/her to make
> jewelry for you. Those two gems are tops as far as I
> can tell and are
> only available as loot. Most gems can be bought from
> vendors but not
> the very best ones. Black pearls add to both str and
> dex and diamonds
> add to 4 different things!
>
> There are many web sites with this info but I though I'd
> give you all
> a quick refresher.
>
> Bujold
> 19th level (stuck here forever it seems)
> Xegony
>
>
